text:
Hi,
I just want to confirm if HubDB (when used for dynamic pages) only supports 2 levels of routes? I test it with 3 levels of routes and seems doesn't work (404 error)

For Example:
/industrial-process-tanks/tank-modifications-and-accessories - this is working
/industrial-process-tanks/tank-modifications-and-accessories/tank-tie-down-kits - Not working
